summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1991, for the improvement of 39th Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from East 55th Street to the north line of Shay's Ravenna Addition to the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks on the east side thereof under Ordinance No. 20396 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
